English: There's no way we can get to the Demon Lord without first killing its minions...
Spanish: No hay manera de que podamos llegar al Señor de los Demonios sin antes matar a sus secuaces..

English: Your power is tremendous! With your help I have made more progress in creating a new Clockworks than I have in my years out here on my own.
Spanish: Tu poder es tremendo. Con tu ayuda he avanzado más en la creación de un nuevo Mecanismo que en los años que llevo aquí solo.

English: You couldn't find the Skeletal Militants and their general? Head to the valley far below.
Spanish: ¿No pudiste encontrar a los Militantes Esqueléticos y a su general? Dirígete al valle que hay más abajo.

English: Kill 80 Skeletal Militants and the Skeleton General.
Spanish: Mata a 80 Militantes Esqueletos y al General Esqueleto.

English: Weapon of the Future
Spanish: Arma del futuro

English: The dream of building a new weapon to defend Madgrial is starting to feel real. The only thing standing in our way is the Crystal Demon Lord.
Spanish: El sueño de construir una nueva arma para defender Madgrial empieza a hacerse realidad. Lo único que se interpone en nuestro camino es el Señor de los Demonios de Cristal.

English: Go collect the Clockworks Core that the Crystal Demon Lord has been guarding all these years. Once you've collected the Clockworks Core, I'm sure that Rankashu would appreciate an update on your progress...
Spanish: Ve a recoger el Núcleo del Reloj que el Señor de los Demonios de Cristal ha estado guardando todos estos años. Una vez que hayas recogido el Núcleo del Reloj, estoy seguro de que Rankashu agradecerá que le pongas al día de tus progresos...

English: Without the Clockworks Core there is no hope to build a new weapon.
Spanish: Sin el Núcleo de Mecanismos no hay esperanza de construir una nueva arma.

English: This is incredible!!! My kin was in Storm Peak all along... and a Clockworks Core was being guarded there, too!? Perhaps the future of Madrigal is brighter than I thought...
Spanish: ¡Esto es increíble! ¿¡Mi familia estaba en el Pico Tormentoso todo el tiempo... y un Núcleo Mecánico estaba siendo custodiado allí, también!? Tal vez el futuro de Madrigal es más brillante de lo que pensaba ..

English: I will spend my days trying to understand this Clockworks Core, perhaps one day Rankashin and I will successfully create the strongest Clockworks of all time!
Spanish: Me pasaré el día intentando comprender el núcleo de este mecanismo de relojería. ¡Quizá algún día Rankashin y yo logremos crear el mecanismo de relojería más potente de todos los tiempos!

English: Destroy the Crystal Demon Lord so I may finally bring a new Clockworks into the world!
Spanish: Destruye al Señor Demonio de Cristal para que pueda traer al mundo un nuevo Mecanismo de Relojería.

English: Defeat the Crystal Demon Lord to obtain the Clockworks Core, then return to Rankashu in Darkon.
Spanish: Derrota al Señor de los Demonios de Cristal para obtener el Núcleo de Mecanismos y regresa a Rankashu en Darkon.

English: Hael's Swords
Spanish: Espada de Hael

English: Altars of a Dark Clown
Spanish: Altares de Payaso Oscuro

English: Hidden within the walls of the Mars Mine are altars decorated with the symbol of the evil clown goddess, Shade.
Spanish: Escondidos en las paredes de la Mina de Marte hay altares con el símbolo de la malvada diosa payaso, Shade.

English: Go visit the mine and see what I mean. The altars all have the symbol of Shade's corruption scattered nearby.
Spanish: Visita y verás a qué me refiero. Todos los altares tienen el símbolo de la corrupción de Shade esparcido cerca.

English: Your curiosity will not go unpunished... to reveal the nature of Shade's power, you must defeat her elite guards within the Mars Mine.
Spanish: Tu curiosidad no quedará impune... para revelar la naturaleza del poder de Shade, debes derrotar a sus guardias de élite dentro de la Mina de Marte.

English: Perhaps this is where your story ends...
Spanish: Quizás aquí es donde termina tu historia.

English: Ah, I can tell you were successful in slaying Shade's elite guards. You're covered in her corrupted energy.
Spanish: Ah, puedo decir que lograste matar a los guardias de élite de Shade. Estás cubierto de su energía corrupta.

English: Being in contact with this much purple magic has been known to cause memory loss... perhaps someone with knowledge of these magics could help you before you go mad.
Spanish: Se sabe que estar en contacto con tanta magia púrpura causa pérdida de memoria... tal vez alguien con conocimiento de estas magias pueda ayudarte antes de que te vuelvas loco.

English: Find and eliminate Shade's elite henchmen within the Mars Mine.
Spanish: Encuentra y elimina a los secuaces de élite de Shade dentro de la Mina de Marte.

English: Kill the elite masquerpets upon each of their altars within the Mars Mine.
Spanish: Mata a los masquerpets de élite en cada altar dentro de la Mina de Marte.

English: A Reunion to Remember
Spanish: Una reunión para recordar

English: Oh you've returned... at least I think I remember you.
Spanish: Oh, has regresado... al menos creo que te recuerdo.

English: You brought me something? Oh, it's a drink... I shouldn't trust you, but for some reason I don't sense any animosity in your aura. I'll take a drink in honor of our reunion today.
Spanish: ¿Me trajiste algo? Oh, es una bebida... No debería confiar en ti, pero por alguna razón no siento ninguna animosidad en tu aura. Tomaré un trago en honor a nuestra reunión de hoy.

English: Well it was nice to see you again...
Spanish: Bueno, fue un placer verte de nuevo.

English: It's all coming back, all the years. A lifetime of adventures are now clear... thanks to you.
Spanish: Todo está regresando, todos los años. Toda una vida de aventuras ahora está clara... gracias a ti.

English: Though I can never repay you for restoring my memories, I hope this gift will show my appreciation. Here, take my blades...
Spanish: Aunque nunca podré pagarte por restaurar mis recuerdos, espero que este regalo demuestre mi agradecimiento. Toma, mis espadas...

English: Don't worry about me, hero. With my memories in tact again, I can finally fight back against the one who took my mind...
Spanish: No te preocupes por mí, héroe. Con mis recuerdos intactos, finalmente puedo luchar contra quien tomó mi mente...

English: Will you let me sip from the cup again?
Spanish: ¿Me dejarás beber de la taza otra vez?

English: Help restore Hael's memories.
Spanish: Ayuda a restaurar los recuerdos de Hael.

English: King of Beasts
Spanish: Rey de las bestias

English: Venomous Vendetta
Spanish: Vendetta Venenosa

English: Have you heard of the legendary King of the Beasts? Brace yourself, adventurer, for he is not one to be easily defeated.
Spanish: ¿Has oído hablar del legendario Rey de las Bestias? Prepárate, aventurero, no es alguien que pueda ser derrotado fácilmente.

English: Before you can even set foot in the presence of the King, you must navigate through a winding path teeming with a vicious monsters.
Spanish: Antes de que puedas siquiera poner un pie en presencia del Rey, debes navegar a través de un camino sinuoso lleno de monstruos feroces.

English: Venture forth and cleanse The Wilds of the fearsome cobras and their master, the Twinstrike Den Mother. Clearing an opening will grant you the breathing space needed to strategize and prepare for what's to come.
Spanish: Aventúrate y limpia Los Salvajes de las temibles cobras y su maestra, Madre Guarida Golpe Gemelo. Despejar una vacante le otorgará el respiro necesario para elaborar estrategias y prepararse para lo que está por venir.

English: Should a mere handful of these snakes cast doubt upon your resolve, the prospect of facing Beast King Khan becomes a distant dream!
Spanish: Si un simple puñado de estas serpientes pone en duda tu determinación, ¡la perspectiva de enfrentarte al Rey Bestia Khan se convierte en un sueño lejano!

English: With the serpents vanquished, your valor shines brightly, hero. Savor a brief rest, but keep your mind sharp, for another battle awaits when you re-enter the untamed Wilds!
Spanish: Con las serpientes vencidas, tu valor brilla intensamente, héroe. ¡Disfruta de un breve descanso, pero mantente alerta, porque habrá otra batalla cuando vuelvas a los indómitos Salvajes!

English: Stay focused, adventurer. Venture back to the Wilds, and press on until the Prismatic Cobras and Twinstrike Den Mother are no more.
Spanish: Mantente concentrado, aventurero. Aventúrate de regreso a Salvajes y continúa hasta que Cobra Prismática y Madre Guarida Golpe Gemelo ya no existan.

English: Defeat 60 Prismatic Cobra, the Twinstrike Den Mother, then 60 Twinstrike Cobra.
Spanish: Derrota a 60 Cobra Prismática, Madre Guarida Golpe Gemelo y luego a 60 Cobra Golpe Gemelo.

English: Tale of Tanuki
Spanish: Cuento de Tanuki

English: The fight through the Wilds has only just begun. Armed with your newfound experience in the Wilds, you're ready to confront something even more perilous.
Spanish: La lucha en los Salvajes apenas ha comenzado. Armado con tu nueva experiencia en lo Salvaje, estás listo para enfrentar algo aún más peligroso.

English: Return to the Wilds and face the army of Tanuki warriors who stand as guardians of the King's lush garden.
Spanish: Regresa a los Salvajes y enfréntate al ejército de guerreros Tanuki que custodian el exuberante jardín del Rey.

English: The last fight certainly tested your mettle. Rest for a while, and let me know when you are ready to proceed.
Spanish: La última pelea puso a prueba tu temple. Descansa un rato y avíseme cuando esté listo para continuar.

English: The King's army has begun to dwindle! Only the most powerful of his guardians remain to defend him.
Spanish: ¡El ejército del Rey está menguando! Sólo los más poderosos de sus guardianes quedan para defenderlo.

English: You're so close to victory adventurer, do not give up hope. Defeat the Tanuki, and march ever closer to the King's chambers.
Spanish: Estás cerca de la victoria aventurero, no pierdas la esperanza. Derrota a los Tanuki y avanza hacia los aposentos del Rey.

English: Defeat 60 Tanuki Enforcer and the Tanuki Protector.
Spanish: Derrota a 60 Tanuki Ejecutor y Tanuki Protector.

English: Defying the Mystic Monarch
Spanish: Desafiando al Monarca Místico

English: The time has come to face King Beast Khan's most powerful allies!
Spanish: ¡Ha llegado el momento de enfrentarse a los aliados más poderosos del Rey Bestia Khan!

English: Deep within the camp of the Wildwoods dwells a potent species of beast known as the Wildwood Stalkers. They are lead by the mysterious Wildwood Shaman, a being believed to imbue them with corrupted magics.
Spanish: En lo profundo del campamento de Bosque Salvaje habita una potente bestia conocida como Acosador Bosque Salvaje. Están dirigidos por el misterioso Chamán Bosque Salvaje, un ser que les imbuye magia corrupta.

English: To challenge the Wildwood without being thoroughly prepared would be a grave mistake.
Spanish: Desafiar a Bosque Salvaje sin estar completamente preparado sería un grave error.

English: The Wildwood have truly fallen!? Well done, hero! Only the King now stands in your path!
Spanish: ¿¡Bosque Salvaje realmente han caído!? ¡Bien hecho, héroe! ¡Ahora sólo el Rey se interpone en tu camino!

English: The Wildwood are a fearsome species. Persevere, and keep pressing forward!
Spanish: Bosque Salvaje son una especie temible. ¡Persevera y sigue adelante!

English: Defeat 60 Wildwood Stalker and the Wildwood Shaman.
Spanish: Derrota a 60 Acosador Bosque Salvaje y al Chamán Bosque Salvaje.

English: Conquering the King
Spanish: Conquistando al Rey

English: Beast King Khan, the sovereign of the Wilds, holds dominion over all the untamed creatures dwelling within its depths. His fury befalls any who dare venture too close to his inner sanctum.
Spanish: El Rey Bestia Khan, el soberano de Lo Salvaje, domina a todas las criaturas indómitas que habitan en sus profundidades. Su furia cae sobre cualquiera que se atreva a acercase a su santuario.

English: Legend speaks of the King's chambers as housing extraordinary treasures, granting those who uncover them unparalleled power. Are you prepared to test the truth of these legends?
Spanish: La leyenda habla de que las cámaras del Rey albergan tesoros extraordinarios que otorgan un poder incomparable. ¿Estás preparado para corroborar estas leyendas?

English: Your time has come to confront the King, hero. Stand against the mighty King Beast Khan, and collect the spoils of your brave endeavors!
Spanish: Ha llegado el momento de enfrentarse al Rey, héroe. ¡Enfréntate al poderoso Rey Bestia Khan y recoge el botín por tus esfuerzos!

English: Take all the time you require to make your preparations. The Beast King will surely remain within.
Spanish: Tómate el tiempo que necesites para prepararte. El Rey Bestia seguramente permanecerá dentro.

English: Astounding, hero! You've vanquished the very King of Beasts himself!
Spanish: ¡Asombroso, héroe! ¡Has vencido al mismísimo Rey de las Bestias!

English: Return to me if you emerge victorious against Beast King Khan.
Spanish: Vuelve a mí si sales victorioso contra el Rey Bestia Khan.

English: Collect the Oversized Heart from Beast King Khan.
Spanish: Recoge el Enorme Corazón del Rey Bestia Khan.

English: Flyff's 20 year anniversary
Spanish: Flyff's 20 year anniversary

English: The Beginnings
Spanish: The Beginnings

English: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.
Spanish: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.

English: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.
Spanish: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.

English: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!
Spanish: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!

English: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.
Spanish: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.

English: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.
Spanish: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.

English: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?
Spanish: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?

English: I'll be waiting!
Spanish: I'll be waiting!

English: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!
Spanish: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!

English: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.
Spanish: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.

English: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.
Spanish: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.

English: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.
Spanish: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.

English: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?
Spanish: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?

English: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.
Spanish: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.

English: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.
Spanish: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.

English: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...
Spanish: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...

English: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?
Spanish: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?

English: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.
Spanish: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.

English: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.
Spanish: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.

English: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.
Spanish: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.

English: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.
Spanish: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.

English: An Old Gift From an Old Friend
Spanish: An Old Gift From an Old Friend

English: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.
Spanish: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.

English: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?
Spanish: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?

English: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!
Spanish: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!

English: He's waiting for you!
Spanish: He's waiting for you!

English: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.
Spanish: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.

English: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.
Spanish: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.

English: To The Skies, For Fun!
Spanish: To The Skies, For Fun!

English: Kill the Mothbees and return to Mr. Flyff.
Spanish: Kill the Mothbees and return to Mr. Flyff.
